span.span: Cameron Public School, home of the Yellow Jackets, has been serving the families and students of Cameron for around 100 years. The last century has seen many faculty come and go and many students graduate and move on. There have been many positive changes including additions to the building / grounds, as well as the ball fields.

Currently we have a little over three hundred students in pre-school through twelfth grades. They come from varied nationalities including foreign exchange students. In addition to the core classes, students can participate in many extra-curricular activities including: baseball, softball, basketball, Ag, FACS, yearbook, academic teams, and FCS.
As we move forward, we will continue to pursue excellence in all areas of the educational process. let's make this a great year here at Cameron Public Schools!
